about.title: METANOIA
content: The word METANOIA (μετάνοια) comes from Greek and often carries the deeper connotation of a transformative change in one's way of thinking, particularly in a spiritual or moral sense.
For us, this change must become structural action.
As the world spins faster and faster (climate change, wars, hate politics, AI, megatrends, monopolies), we have only ONE option: ACT!

manifesto.title: Manifesto 1.0
content: METANOIA COMMUNITY is a group of global citizens who know that the solution to current world challenges lies in ACTION.
Too much time is spent theorizing, doom scrolling, focusing on differences, and so forth, while what needs to happen is to develop the habit of ACTION, COURAGE, and small DAILY victories.
goals: STOP the flow of money and power from the bottom to the top
Help people and communities to create a new system
Encourage local focus and local living
Encourage people to join local politics
Facilitate the application of global knowledge to local challenges

founders.title: Founders Guidelines
founders.commitment: At METANOIA COMMUNITY, we recognize these and other challenges and will try our best to mitigate them.
